definition: to perch/to rest (of birds)/to dwell/to live/to stay
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Zhalong is the ideal home for cranes and many other endangered birds.
sentences.chinese: 扎龍是鶴和其它瀕危鳥類的理想棲息地。

sentences.english: The expansion of agricultural land is destroying tigers’ habitats and food supply.
sentences.chinese: 農耕用地不斷擴大，破壞了老虎的棲息地和食物來源。

sentences.english: This is the only home of the red Colobus monkey but there are very few left.
sentences.chinese: 這是紅色疣猴的唯一棲息地，但是現在所剩無幾了。

sentences.english: Gusseted tongue keeps debris in its natural habitat.
sentences.chinese: 插角舌頭保持在其自然棲息地的碎片。

sentences.english: The second largest habitat was designed to copy the natural environment of beluga whales.
sentences.chinese: 第二大棲息地是摹仿白鯨的自然生活環境而設計的。
我們還侵佔它們的棲息地，鋪路蓋房子。

sentences.english: Both are designated primarily for migrating and wintering birds.
sentences.chinese: 它們都主要是過路和越冬鳥類的棲息地。

sentences.english: We have planted insectaries between our olive trees to provide year-round habitat for our insectivorous guests.
sentences.chinese: 在橄欖樹之間建造昆蟲館提供整年的昆蟲棲息地。

sentences.english: Wetland is a significant habitat for Ciconia boyciana.
sentences.chinese: 溼地是東方白鸛賴以生存的棲息地。

sentences.english: Conclusion Applying rodent control on the rat's habitat is important measure to sustainable rodent control.
sentences.chinese: 結論棲息地滅鼠是鼠害可持續控制的一項重要措施。

sentences.english: Up on a little island there was a haul-out point for seals.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的一座小島上，有一處海豹棲息地。

sentences.english: Thus three ponds of different sizes appeared as the home of the Yellow Dragon's family.
sentences.chinese: 剷出了三個大小不等的潭作爲黃龍一家的棲息地。

sentences.english: The hind legs of the gerbil are particularly well adapted to leaping across its desert habitat.
sentences.chinese: 沙鼠的後腿尤其適應於在沙漠棲息地跳躍。

sentences.english: The lake is noted as a home to many birds.
sentences.chinese: 這個湖作爲許多鳥類的棲息地遐邇聞名。

sentences.english: Bushmeat hunters and habitat loss are the main threats
sentences.chinese: 叢林肉獵人和喪失棲息地是主要威脅。

sentences.english: Characteristics and methods of research on ungulates′ habitat selection in China were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了中國有蹄類棲息地選擇研究的特點和方法。

definition: Shennongjialin, directly administered forestry reserve in east Hubei
(of a bird) to perch/(of creatures in general) to inhabit/to dwell
population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
lit. men's footprints are rare (idiom)/fig. off the beaten track/lonely/deserted
